sentences.sentence: Thiss watery pasta dish looks very unappetising, particularly when served with a small pot of jelly.
sentences.translation: 这盘水分过多的通心粉看起来让人毫无食欲，尤其它的配料居然是一小盒果冻！ ¡。

sentences.sentence: Japanese company created sunglasses with blue lenses to make food look unappetising, thus reducing appetite.
sentences.translation: 日本一家公司创造了有蓝光的太阳镜使食物看起来没有食欲，因此减少胃口。
